mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(user_id, password, email, gender, birth, profile_name, profile_img, login_type) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{profileName}, #{profileImg}, #{loginType})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE profile_name = #{profileName}
SELECT user_id FROM USER WHERE birth = #{birth} AND email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET password = #{password} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE USER SET email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, profile_name = #{profileName}, profile_img = #{profileImg} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
